name: The Parabox
description:
A mysterious box has arrived at Ludwig's doorstep; addressed to Coots. When Coot's natural instincts take over, she not only jumps into the box, but into the unknown. Now she must absorb the essences of her split nine lives to become free... from the Parabox.  

Controls- 

Left Mouse button> Left Paw

Right Mouse button> Right Paw

Click the mouse buttons once the notes are in paw range in order to absorb them.
